content: Tian Li is a Associate Professor at Department of Energy and Process Engineering, Norwegian University of Science and Technology. He is part of the ComKin Group, which applies modern numerical methods and experimental studies to problems arising in combustion systems, with a special emphasis on clean and sustainable energy production.
summary: Tian Li is a Associate Professor at Department of Energy and Process Engineering, Norwegian University of Science and Technology. He is part of the ComKin Group, which applies modern numerical methods and experimental studies to problems arising in combustion systems, with a special emphasis on clean and sustainable energy production.
title: Tian Li

content: Tasks: SP leader on education and training; supervising a PhD student on developing computational models for optimizing biocarbon production
summary: Optimising the biocarbon value chain for sustainable metallurgical industry
title: BioCarbUp

content: Tasks: SP leader on idealized particle experiments and CFD simulations; developing simplified soot formation model; developing CFD solvers for simulating gasification of biomass; performing experimental studies on high- temperature biomass gasification
summary: Fundamental insight into biomass gasification using experiments and mathematical modelling
title: GASPRO
